name: Conservation Lands, Administered Lands
query: CONSERVATION_LAND_TYPE = 'Administered Lands' AND TENURE_TYPE NOT IN( 'Lease - WMA' , 'Lease' )

name: Mineral Reserve Sites
query: MTA_SITE_ORDER_RESTR_CODE = 'N' AND MTA_SITE_REASON_CODE IN ('ECOL', 'ENVI', 'PROT', 'WLDL', 'WLDN', 'PADD', 'PARK')
comments_2019: O&G unknown. Limited to no registraion reserve catergory.

name: Ungulate Winter Range, No Harvest
query: TIMBER_HARVEST_CODE = 'NO HARVEST ZONE'
comments_2019: Under EMPR, section 6: operations are not to be located in WHA areas. Check of tenure with WHA indicates XXXXXX

name: Wildlife Habitat Areas, No harvest
query: TIMBER_HARVEST_CODE = 'NO HARVEST ZONE' AND FEATURE_NOTES NOT LIKE '%not a legal boundary%'
comments_2019: Under EMPR, section 6: operations are not to be located in WHA areas. Overlay of non-expired tenures shows overlap with WHA areas (indicate not srict restriction (?).

name: Biodiversity Mining and Tourism Areas
query: LEGAL_FEAT_OBJECTIVE = 'Biodiversity, Mining and Tourism Areas (BMTA)'
comments_2019: O&G unknown. No commercial logging operations but mining activities permitted

name: Sea to Sky Wildland Area
query: STRGC_LAND_RSRCE_PLAN_NAME = 'Sea to Sky Land and Resource Management Plan' AND LEGAL_FEAT_OBJECTIVE = 'Wildland Area'
comments_2019: Mining and Comercial timber harvest are allowed in subsections of the wildland zone (50% area), and in some other area limited by Visual quality guidelines. Oil exploration is allowed subject to FN social, cultural and environ uses.

name: Special Wildland RMZ in Muskwa Kechika MA
Old Growth Management Areas - Legal Current
comments_2019: Guidelines specified in section 7 of the EPM, further a letter of expectation wrtiten by FLRORD for OGAA statutory decision makers outlined the % of disturbance that can occur with in OGMAs of different sizes. See References doc specifies 10% under OGMA of less that 100ha, and 5ha or 10% for greater than 100 ha. OGMA's covered under Land Use Objectives Regulations under the Land Act (previously they were designated under forest practise code).

name: VQO Preserves
query: REC_MADE_KNOWN_CODE = 'Y' AND REC_EVQO_CODE = 'P'
comments_2019: Section 16 of Forest Recreation regulations specifes buisness or industry must be approved by rec. officer. Specifications under the EMPR designates rec sites as a resource feature and specifes no damage or render ineffective. Originally marked low after discusssion with Brandy but coudl be medium based on legistlation?

name: Designated Areas
query: RETIREMENT_DATE > '{currdate}' OR DESIGNATED_AREA_NAME = 'Yale Area 3'

name: Flathead Watershed Area
comments_2019: Provisions for permits to cut and adjust the AAC included in regulation for designated areas. Covered under Forest Act

name: Class1 Coast Grizzly Bear Habitat (Coast LUP)
query: GB_CLASS = 1
comments_2019: No oil and gas exploration and designated as coal land reserve. No mention of forest/ timber although seems to have been managed

name: Nlhaxten/Cayoosh Wildland Area
query: STRGC_LAND_RSRCE_PLAN_NAME = 'Lillooet Land and Resource Management Plan' AND LEGAL_FEAT_OBJECTIVE = 'Wildland Area'

name: South Chilcotin Mountains Mining and Tourism Areas
query: STRGC_LAND_RSRCE_PLAN_NAME = 'Lillooet Land and Resource Management Plan' AND LEGAL_FEAT_OBJECTIVE = 'Mining and Tourism Area'

name: Forest Rec Sites - high
query: PROJECT_TYPE in ('Recreation Reserve', 'Interpretative Forest') and FILE_STATUS_CODE = 'HI' and RETIREMENT_DATE IS NULL
comments_2019: Forestry restricted by tourism and mining allowed as per lilloett land and resource management plan.

name: Forest Rec Sites - med
query: PROJECT_TYPE in ('Recreation Site', 'Recreation Trail') and FILE_STATUS_CODE = 'HI' and RETIREMENT_DATE IS NULL
comments_2019: Forestry restricted by tourism and mining allowed as per lilloett land and resource management plan.

name: VQO Retention
query: REC_MADE_KNOWN_CODE = 'Y' AND REC_EVQO_CODE = 'R'

name: Special Management RMZ in Muskwa Kechika MA
Ungulate Winter Range, Conditional Harvest
query: TIMBER_HARVEST_CODE = 'CONDITIONAL HARVEST ZONE'
comments_2019: Under EMPR, section 6: operations are not to be located in WHA areas. Check of tenure with WHA indicates XXXXXX

name: Wildlife Habitat Areas, Conditional harvest
query: TIMBER_HARVEST_CODE = 'CONDITIONAL HARVEST ZONE' AND FEATURE_NOTES NOT LIKE '%not a legal boundary%'
comments_2019: Under EMPR, section 6: operations are not to be located in WHA areas. Check of tenure with WHA indicates XXXXXX

name: VQO Partial Retention
query: REC_MADE_KNOWN_CODE = 'Y' AND REC_RVQC_CODE = 'pr'

name: VQO Modify
query: REC_MADE_KNOWN_CODE = 'Y' AND REC_RVQC_CODE = 'm'

name: Community Watersheds
comments_2019: Must consider and notify parties involved in O&G act when designated as comm.watershed. No restrictions listed. Listed as medium influence on internal document reviewing the incluence on NRS.

name: VQO Maximum Modify
query: REC_MADE_KNOWN_CODE = 'Y' AND REC_EVQO_CODE = 'MM'

name: Class2 Coast Grizzly Bear Habitat
query: GB_CLASS = 2

name: Lakes South Landscape Corridor
query: STRGC_LAND_RSRCE_PLAN_NAME = 'Lakes South Sustainable Resource Management Plan' AND LEGAL_FEAT_OBJECTIVE = 'Landscape Corridors'
comments_2019: Added 2020 update, Landscape corridors specified under 2003 Lakes South sustainable RMP, for targets in forestry restrictions (https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/industry/crown-land-water/land-use-planning/regions/skeena/lakes-lrmp/lakessouth-srmp ;

name: Fisheries Sensitive Watersheds
comments_2019: Some general regulations relating to wildlife act.  O&G - Under EMPR, section 6: operations are not to be located with FSW designated areas. Overlay of non-expired tenures and FSW indicated overlaps present. (indicate not srict restriction (?). http://www.env.gov.bc.ca/wld/documents/fsw/171231_FSW%20Default%20Objectives%20Designation%20Procedure.pdf

name: Important Fisheries Watersheds (Great Bear Rainforest LUO)
comments_2019: some restrictions on foresty extraction within the GBR (forest Management) act to specific zones, some areas classed as Biodiversity, mining and tourism zones.

name: Atlin-Taku Forest Retention Areas
query: STRGC_LAND_RSRCE_PLAN_NAME = 'Atlin - Taku Strategic Land and Resource Plan' AND LEGAL_FEAT_OBJECTIVE = 'Forest Retention Area'

name: Land Act s. 15
query: TENURE_STAGE = 'TENURE' AND TENURE_TYPE = 'RESERVE/NOTATION' AND TENURE_SUBTYPE = 'SEC 15 OIC RESERVE' AND TENURE_PURPOSE = 'ENVIRONMENT, CONSERVATION, & RECR' AND TENURE_SUBPURPOSE IN ('ECOLOGICAL RESERVE' , 'ENVIRONMENT PROTECTION/CONSERVATION' , 'FISH AND WILDLIFE MANAGEMENT' , 'PROTECTED AREA STRATEGY', 'WATERSHED RESERVE')

name: Land Act s. 16
query: TENURE_STAGE = 'TENURE' AND TENURE_TYPE = 'RESERVE/NOTATION' AND TENURE_SUBTYPE = 'SEC 16 MAP RESERVE' AND TENURE_PURPOSE = 'ENVIRONMENT, CONSERVATION, & RECR' AND TENURE_SUBPURPOSE IN ('ECOLOGICAL RESERVE' , 'ENVIRONMENT PROTECTION/CONSERVATION' , 'FISH AND WILDLIFE MANAGEMENT' , 'PROTECTED AREA STRATEGY', 'WATERSHED RESERVE')

name: Land Act s. 17
query: TENURE_STAGE = 'TENURE' AND TENURE_TYPE = 'RESERVE/NOTATION' AND TENURE_SUBTYPE = 'SEC 17 DESIGNATED USE AREA' AND TENURE_PURPOSE = 'ENVIRONMENT, CONSERVATION, & RECR' AND TENURE_SUBPURPOSE IN ('ECOLOGICAL RESERVE' , 'ENVIRONMENT PROTECTION/CONSERVATION'

name: Land Act s. 66
query: TENURE_STAGE = 'TENURE' AND TENURE_TYPE = 'RESERVE/NOTATION' AND TENURE_SUBTYPE = 'SEC 66 PROHIBITED USE AREA' AND TENURE_PURPOSE = 'ENVIRONMENT, CONSERVATION, & RECR' AND TENURE_SUBPURPOSE IN ('ECOLOGICAL RESERVE' , 'ENVIRONMENT PROTECTION/CONSERVATION' , 'FISH AND WILDLIFE MANAGEMENT' , 'PROTECTED AREA STRATEGY', 'WATERSHED RESERVE')

name: Haida Gwaii Land Use Order Reserves
query: STRGC_LAND_RSRCE_PLAN_NAME = 'Haida Gwaii Land Use Objectives Order' AND LEGAL_FEAT_OBJECTIVE IN( 'Forest Reserve' , 'Northern Goshawk Reserve' , 'Northern Saw-whet Owl Reserve' )
comments_2019: Specifically for forest reserves, northern goshawk reserves and northern saw-whet owl reserves

name: GBR Special Forest Management Areas
url: ftp://ftp.geobc.gov.bc.ca/sections\outgoing\dss\GeoBC_Digital_Media\GreatBearRainforest_Act\regulation - special forest management area SFMAs\data\GBR SFMA 2016 December.shp
